ee:transform.doc:name: check availability, calculate subtotal, totalTax, set listPartners, warehouseShipping

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- if (payload.locationType == "PARTNER") (vars.listPartners + payload) distinctBy $.locationId else vars.listPartners
%dw 2.0 output application/java --- if ((payload.locationType == "WAREHOUSE") and (payload.shipping > vars.shippingPrice)) payload.shipping else vars.shippingPrice
%dw 2.0 output application/java --- if (vars.listPartners != []) (vars.shippingPrice + (vars.listPartners reduce ((item, sum1 = 0) -> sum1 + (item.shipping)))) else vars.shippingPrice

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json var postalAddress = vars.customerData.deliveryAddresses filter ($.'type' == "SHIPPING") map { address: $.address, city: $.city, postalCode: $.postalCode, state: $.state, country: $.country } --- { variantId: payload.orderItemId, productId: payload.productId, quantity: payload.quantity, customerId: vars.inputOrder.customerId, name: (vars.customerData.firstName ++ " " ++ vars.customerData.lastName), price: payload.price as Number, address: postalAddress[0], partnerId: payload.location.locationId }

%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "variantId": payload.orderItemId, "productId": payload.productId, "locationId": payload.location.locationId, "locationType": payload.location.locationType, "quantity": payload.quantity, "customerId": vars.inputOrder.customerId }

%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { subtotal: ((round(vars.subtotal)*100)/100) as String, taxPrice: ((round(vars.taxPrice)*100)/100) as String, shippingPrice: ((round (vars.shippingPrice)*100)/100) as String, total: ((round (vars.subtotal + vars.taxPrice + vars.shippingPrice)*100)/100) as String, status: "Draft", orderItems: { pickupItems : (vars.inputOrder.orderItems filter $.location.locationType == "STORE") map (orderItem) -> { productName: orderItem.productName, price: orderItem.price, quantity: orderItem.quantity, location: orderItem.location, productId: orderItem.productId, orderItemId: orderItem.orderItemId }, shipmentItems : (vars.inputOrder.orderItems filter $.location.locationType == "WAREHOUSE") map (orderItem) -> { productName: orderItem.productName, price: orderItem.price, quantity: orderItem.quantity, location: orderItem.location, productId: orderItem.productId, orderItemId: orderItem.orderItemId }, partnersItems : (vars.inputOrder.orderItems filter $.location.locationType == "PARTNER") map (orderItem) -> { productName: orderItem.productName, price: orderItem.price, quantity: orderItem.quantity, location: orderItem.location, productId: orderItem.productId, orderItemId: orderItem.orderItemId } } }

%dw 2.0 output application/json var pickupItems = vars.inputOrder.orderItems filter $.location.locationType == "STORE" var warehouseItems = vars.inputOrder.orderItems filter $.location.locationType == "WAREHOUSE" var partnerItems = vars.inputOrder.orderItems filter $.location.locationType == "PARTNER" --- { "type": "EMAIL", priority: "MINOR", recipient: vars.customerData.emailAddress, subject: "Order - $(vars.order.identifier) | Anypoint Store", message: "Hello, Your order [ $(vars.order.identifier) ] has been placed.

" ++ (if (pickupItems !=null) ("Items to be picked up in store: 

" ++ (pickupItems map ( "Product Name:" ++ $.productName ++ "
" ++ "Quantity:" ++ $.quantity ++ "
" ++ "Price:" ++ $.price ++ "
" ) joinBy "
") ++ "-----------------------------

" ) else '') ++ (if (warehouseItems !=null) ("Items to be shipped: 

" ++ (warehouseItems map ( "Product Name:" ++ $.productName ++ "
" ++ "Quantity:" ++ $.quantity ++ "
" ++ "Price:" ++ $.price ++ "
" ) joinBy "
") ++ "-----------------------------

" ) else '') ++ (if (partnerItems !=null) ("Items ordered from partners: 

" ++ (partnerItems map ( "Product Name:" ++ $.productName ++ "
" ++ "Quantity:" ++ $.quantity ++ "
" ++ "Price:" ++ $.price ++ "
" ) joinBy "
") ++ "-----------------------------

" ) else '') ++ "Total price: " ++ ((round (vars.subtotal + vars.taxPrice + vars.shippingPrice)*100)/100) as String ++ " USD

" ++ "We will inform you about future updates.
